custom_78418 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: The Commissioner of Education has established updates for Texas Superintendents regarding the coronavirus situation. These updates will occur between 3:00 and 4:00 each day and will include debriefing opportunities from health organizations across the country. Should any closures or specific directions be shared by the Commissioner, Lockney ISD will post the information to our website and our FaceBook Page as quickly as possible. We are making a concentrated effort to sanitize our campuses before the kiddos come back from Spring Break and we will continue to encourage our students to take precautions against spreading any illness. We hope you have a great spring break and we look forward to getting our “village” back together next week.

The UIL has suspended all activities scheduled between March 16 and March 29. Our Baseball and Softball games scheduled for 11:00 tomorrow will be played. Our District Executive Committee will meet to discuss rescheduling games as we get closer to the 29th.
Additionally, our Academic UIL Meet, which was scheduled during the suspension window, will be rescheduled as well. Coaches will be in touch with information regarding practices.
We will keep you posted as the situation unfolds. Keep those hands washed and take advantage of the opportunity to get some rest.
